name: Rare Tuna Confit
recipeIngredient: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Season tuna steaks with salt and pepper. Place in a heatproof container, just large enough to fit steaks in a single layer. In a small saucepan over medium heat, heat remaining ingredients until garlic cloves begin to turn golden brown. Pour mixture over tuna; it should cover the fish.
Cover and refrigerate for 24 hours. To serve, thinly slice the tuna and lay over dressed salad greens.
